# elementStructType()

**Instance Method**

Provides a description of the underlying struct type when an array holds structs as its elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func elementStructType() -> MTLStructType?
```

## Return Value

An object that describes the struct. If the array elements aren’t structs, this method returns `nil`.

## Discussion

Use this method if [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArrayType/elementType] is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDataType/struct].

## Obtaining details for complex array elements

- **element()**: Provides a description of the underlying type when an array holds other arrays as its elements.
- **elementPointerType()**: Provides a description of the underlying pointer type when an array holds pointers as its elements.
- **elementTextureReferenceType()**: Provides a description of the underlying texture type when an array holds textures as its elements.
